thread.section_title: SecureDataRecovery.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SecureDataRecovery.com | securedatarecovery.com
thread.title: Jonathan Hsu

author: Jonathan Hsu
title: Jonathan Hsu
text: My hard drive failed recently, and I had to look for service options to recover my data. Luckily, I came across Secure Data Recovery, and working with them and my account representative, Jeremy, has been an absolute pleasure. What I appreciated the most, was that they were in constant communication with me throughout the process and kept me informed. Now, I've received my data back, and am one happy camper!
